Title: The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert
Actors: Hugo Weaving, Guy Pearce, Terence Stamp, Rebel Penfold-Russell
Plot: Two drag-queens (Anthony/Mitzi and Adam/Felicia) and a transgender woman contract to perform a drag show at a resort in Alice Springs, a resort town in the remote Australian desert. They head west from Sydney aboard their lavender bus, Priscilla. En route, it is discovered that the woman they've contracted with is Anthony's wife. Their bus breaks down, and is repaired by Bob, who travels on with them.
Production: Australian Film Finance Corporation, Specific Films
